00028 #ifndef __OgreGLContext_H__
00029 #define __OgreGLContext_H__
00030 
00031 #include "OgreGLPrerequisites.h"
00032 
00033 namespace Ogre {
00034 
00041     class _OgreGLExport GLContext
00042     {
00043     public:
00044         GLContext();
00045         virtual ~GLContext();
00046 
00050         virtual void setCurrent() = 0;
00055         virtual void endCurrent() = 0;
00056         
00057         bool getInitialized() { return initialized; };
00058         void setInitialized() { initialized = true; };
00059 
00064         virtual GLContext* clone() const = 0;
00065 
00069         virtual void releaseContext() {}
00070     protected:
00071         bool initialized;
00072     };
00073 }
